org.apache.http.impl.nio.pool

Class BasicNIOPoolEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.pool.PoolEntry<HttpHost,NHttpClientConnection>
      • org.apache.http.impl.nio.pool.BasicNIOPoolEntry

  • @ThreadSafe
public class BasicNIOPoolEntry
extends PoolEntry<HttpHost,NHttpClientConnection>
    A basic PoolEntry implementation that represents an entry in a pool of non-blocking NHttpClientConnections identified by an HttpHost instance.
    Since:
    4.2
    See Also:
    HttpHost

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicNIOPoolEntry(String id, HttpHost route, NHttpClientConnection conn) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Invalidates the pool entry and closes the pooled connection associated with it.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns true if the pool entry has been invalidated.
